import React from "react"; import "../styles/lastMovies.scss"; import moment from 'moment' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import useFetch from "../hooks/useFetch"; type Movies = { movieId: number, title: string, image: string, description:string, release: string; rating: number, }; const {data: movies, error, loading} = useFetch("https://localhost:7063/api/movies/lastmovies") export default function LastMovies() { return (

Latest Movies

{loading &&

Loading data...

} {movies && movies.map((n) => (

{movie.title}

IMDb {movie.rating}

{movie.description} ..more

{moment(movie.release).format('MMMM d yyyy')}

))}
); }
